mapper.select: select a.id,a.group_id as 'group.id', a.collect_time, a.status,b.*,c.name 'group.name',b.member_id as memberId,b.member_id as 'member.id',d.name as 'member.name' from tbl_group_topic as a INNER JOIN tbl_archive as b ON a.archive_id = b.archive_id LEFT JOIN tbl_group as c ON a.group_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tbl_member as d on b.member_id=d.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_group_topic (collect_time, group_id, archive_id,status) values (now(), #{groupId}, #{archiveId},#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_group_topic SET status = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
